# Tracklyt - Theme

A modern, mobile-first theme built for Bootstrap 5.2.3, designed specifically for the Tracklyt time keeping & project management platform.

Tracklyt time keeping & project management platform.

## ğŸ¨ Features

- **Modern Design**: Sleek, professional color scheme optimized for readability
- **Mobile-First**: Fully responsive with mobile-optimized components and layouts
- **Bootstrap 5.2.3 Compatible**: Built on top of Bootstrap with custom overrides
- **Custom Components**: Pre-built trading platform components (stat cards, tier cards, transaction cards, etc.)
- **Smooth Animations**: Scroll-triggered animations and smooth transitions
- **Utility Classes**: Extensive utility classes for rapid development
- **Interactive JavaScript**: Enhanced UI interactions and helper functions
